TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICivicAddressResolver

Docs.summary: 提供方法，以便在實作時將緯度/經度位置解析成實體地址。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要解決<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>至<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress>以非同步方式實作<xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>，並提供民事位址資料給<xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted>事件。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Device.Location.CivicAddress ResolveAddress(class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate coordinate) cil managed
Public Function ResolveAddress (coordinate As GeoCoordinate) As CivicAddress

Docs.param: 要解析成地址的緯度/經度位置。
Docs.summary: 將 同步解析成實體地址。

remarks.format:
